title: Cone of Cold
tags: how to acquire cone of cold
content:
Cone of Cold Level 5 Evocation Spell 8~64 Damage 8d8cold Make a flurry of frost, crisp air, and condensed snow crystals erupt from your hands. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 9m CON Save Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Evocation Spell

Make a flurry of frost, crisp air, and condensed snow crystals erupt from your hands.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Cone of Cold is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Cone of Cold is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for
